trans-unit.source: Represents a column header for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" />.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> object is a button control that is derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> 개체는 단추 컨트롤에서 파생 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> properties keep track of mouse events and the resizing of columns.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> 속성 열 크기를 조정 하 고 마우스 이벤트는 추적.

trans-unit.source: Column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode are <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> objects.
You can customize <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> objects by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> 다양 한 속성을이 클래스 및 관련된 클래스를 사용 하 여 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 간의 우선 순위 및 이러한 속성에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 하십시오. [GridView 열 머리글 스타일 및 템플릿 개요](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> 는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, 즉, 모든 형식 (예: 문자열, 이미지 또는 패널)의 단일 개체가 포함 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
Each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> can contain a context (right-click) menu.
trans-unit.target: 각 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> 단추로 상황에 맞는 메뉴 포함 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a context menu for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 상황에 맞는 메뉴를 만드는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> XAML에서 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> class.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
The default is <see langword="null" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column%2A> dependency property.
The event arguments.
Responds when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> is pressed.
Responds to the creation of the visual tree for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.

This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> and updates the floating version of the header when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole.Floating>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 설정의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> 부동 머리글의 버전을 업데이트 하 고 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> 속성이로 설정 되어 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole.Floating>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click" /> event for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
This implementation does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event when a column is changing its position.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현은 발생 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> 열 위치가 변경 되 면 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Provides an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementation for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus" /> event for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> implementation of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostKeyboardFocus%2A> clears mouse capture.
This implementation does not change the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter" /> event when the user pauses the mouse pointer on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter" />에서 마우스 포인터를 일시 중지할 때 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> 이벤트에 대한 클래스 처리를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event when the user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> and its column to a new location in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> by using the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> 사용자가을 끌 때 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> 과 해당 열에서 새 위치로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> 마우스를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To handle the event, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> 로 설정 되어 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave" /> event when the mouse moves off the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 마우스가 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave" /> 밖으로 이동할 때 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> 이벤트에 대한 클래스 처리를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event when the user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> with the mouse from its old location, to move the header and its column.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> 사용자가을 끌 때 이벤트는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> 머리글과 해당 열을 이동 하려면 이전 위치에서 마우스를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To handle the event, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 처리 하는 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> 로 설정 되어 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event data.

Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> event when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" />에서 마우스 포인터를 일시 중지하는 동안 마우스 왼쪽 단추를 누를 때 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> 이벤트에 대한 클래스 처리를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event so that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> can support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> 이벤트 있도록는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 열을 이동 하는 끌어서 놓기 작업을 지원할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This method captures the mouse and sets the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드 캡처 마우스 및 집합은 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> 이벤트 인수를 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event data.

Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp" /> event when the user releases the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp" />에서 마우스 포인터를 일시 중지하는 동안 마우스 왼쪽 단추를 놓을 때 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> 이벤트에 대한 클래스 처리를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event (which occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: 이 구현 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> 이벤트 (발생 때는 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> 속성에는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> 로 설정 되어 `true`).

trans-unit.source: It also ends the mouse capture that was set by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 또한 마우스 캡처에 의해 설정 된 종료는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: This provides a way for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 방법을 제공는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 열을 이동 하는 끌어서 놓기 작업을 지원 하도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true`.
The event data.

Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove" /> event that occurs when the user moves the mouse within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove" /> 내에서 마우스를 이동할 때 발생하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> 이벤트에 대한 클래스 처리를 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation keeps the left mouse button in a pressed state while a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> is moved by a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현 하는 동안 누른된 상태에서 마우스 왼쪽된 단추를 유지 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> 끌어서 놓기 작업으로 이동 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This also causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> to remain set to `true` when the mouse with its left mouse button pressed moves off the header.
trans-unit.target: 이 인해는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> 에 설정 된 상태로 유지 `true` 마우스 왼쪽된 단추를 사용 하 여 마우스 눌렀음을 헤더 밖으로 이동 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation keeps the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event so that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method can support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현은 유지는 <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> 로 설정 하는 이벤트 인수 `false` 에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> 이벤트 있도록는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 메서드 열을 이동 하는 끌어서 놓기 작업을 지원할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Information about the change in the size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
Responds to a change in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" /> dimensions.
Gets the role of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole" /> enumeration value that specifies the current role of the column.
trans-unit.target: 열의 현재 역할을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole" /> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> class performs layout for the column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> and places an additional column header at the end to add space.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> 의 열 머리글에 대 한 레이아웃을 수행 하는 클래스는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> 추가 열 머리글에 공백을 추가 하려면 끝에 배치 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole.Padding> identifies this column header in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> 값 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole.Padding> 에서이 열 머리글을 식별 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole.Floating> identifies a column that is currently the object of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> 값 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole.Floating> 열은 현재는 끌어서 놓기 작업의 개체를 식별 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> dependency property.
The dependency property.
Determines whether to serialize a <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" /> must be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />를 serialize해야 하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
This method applies to the following dependency properties:
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 다음과 같은 종속성 속성에 적용 됩니다.
